title: Lady of the Drake
description: Lana's village is being consumed by a devastating plague. The last hope for a cure lies in a forbidden forest claimed by dragons.Deep in the woods she finds a breathtaking realm of sorcery and untamed passion. Alaron, the seductive keeper of the forest, offers what she seeks and more.She’s swept up in the mysterious keeper’s world of secrets, lust and magic; but the entire kingdom is dying--and there may be no way to save it!
author: J.V. Altharas
